definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 当今中国数学界面对的大难，便是缺乏领导者。

sentences.english: Leadership Don't get blinded by the cult-hero worshiped "Big L" leaders;
sentences.chinese: 领导能力无须盲目崇拜“大人物”领导者。

sentences.english: Who then is the Rockets' leader?
sentences.chinese: 那谁才是火箭的领导者？

sentences.english: Thank you to the Great Leader and artist in our city, Thank you Mr. LU.
sentences.chinese: 感谢本城的杰出领导者和艺术家，陆先生。

sentences.english: The IMB is likely to lead in Libyia as well.
sentences.chinese: 看起来IMB很可能是利比亚的新领导者了。

sentences.english: But that cause is much bigger than any one leader.
sentences.chinese: 但这事业具有比任何一个领导者更伟大的意义。

sentences.english: But the leadership of markets has shifted in the past month.
sentences.chinese: 但在过去一个月，市场的领导者已经变换。

sentences.english: She is a capable pilot, and a shrewd leader.
sentences.chinese: 她是出色的飞行员和贤明的领导者。

sentences.english: You have boring, and rational, and precised leaders.
sentences.chinese: 也有严肃乏味理智冷静，但又精确全面的领导者。

sentences.english: E. 01- Great leaders inspire greatness in others.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的领导者激励我们前进。

sentences.english: So what is the difference between Leaders and Leadership?
sentences.chinese: 那么领导者和领导能力之间有什么不同呢？
一些领导者是富有传奇色彩的英雄。

sentences.english: When leaders treat the member well occasionally, they accept any and all crumbs gratefully.
sentences.chinese: 当领导者偶尔略施小惠，他们便感激涕零。

sentences.english: Autocratic leaders tend to make unilateral decisions, dictate work methods.
sentences.chinese: 专制型领导者倾向于单方面做出决策，支配工作方法。

sentences.english: Leader in drive systems for off- highway and industrial applications.
sentences.chinese: 非公路用途和工业用途传动系统领域的领导者。

sentences.english: Develop policies to ensure business leaders can cope with the current changes to social trends.
sentences.chinese: 制定方案，阐明商业领导者怎样应对社会趋势的变化。

definition: spiritual leader (of a nation or church)/religious leader
